upgrade:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `config` (
    `id` INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    `created_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `updated_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `label` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    `key` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    `value` TEXT NOT NULL
) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `info` (
    `id` INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    `created_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `updated_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `msg1` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL
) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `product` (
    `id` INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    `created_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `updated_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    `view_num` INT NOT NULL  COMMENT 'View Num',
    `sort` INT NOT NULL,
    `is_reviewed` BOOL NOT NULL  COMMENT 'Is Reviewed',
    `image` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    `body` LONGTEXT NOT NULL
) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `user` (
    `id` INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    `created_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `updated_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `username` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    `password` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    `last_login` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  COMMENT 'Last Login',
    `is_active` BOOL NOT NULL  COMMENT 'Is Active' DEFAULT 1,
    `is_superuser` BOOL NOT NULL  COMMENT 'Is SuperUser' DEFAULT 0,
    `avatar` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL  DEFAULT '',
    `intro` LONGTEXT NOT NULL
) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `category` (
    `id` INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    `created_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `updated_at` DATETIME(6) NOT NULL  DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),
    `slug` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    `name` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    `user_id` INT NOT NULL COMMENT 'User',
    CONSTRAINT `fk_category_user_e2e3874c` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `aerich` (
    `id` INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
    `version` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    `app` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `product_category` (
    `product_id` INT NOT NULL,
    `category_id` INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (`product_id`) REFERENCES `product` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (`category_id`) REFERENCES `category` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;
